iShares ® iShares Trust Supplement dated
February 19, 2025to the Summary Prospectus,
Prospectus and Statement of Additional
Information for the iShares MSCI Global
Sustainable Development Goals ETF (the “Fund”)
The following name change for the Fund’s
Underlying Index was effective on February 3,
2025:
                                              
                 Prior           New          
  Fund           Underlying      Underlying   
                 Index           Index        
                 Name            Name         
  iShares                        MSCI ACWI    
  MSCI Global    MSCI ACWI       Sustainable  
  Sustainable    Sustainable     Development  
  Development    Impact Index    Index        
  Goals ETF                                   
                                              
If you have any questions, please call
1‑800‑iShares (1‑800‑474‑2737). iShares ®is a
registered trademark of BlackRock Fund
Advisors and its affiliates.
IS‑A‑SUPP‑SDG‑0225 PLEASE RETAIN THIS
SUPPLEMENT FOR FUTURE REFERENCE
